properties.entry: CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER notice_trigger AFTER INSERT ON NOTICE FOR EACH STATEMENT DECLARE BEGIN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('New Notice inserted into table'); END;

CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER notice_trigger AFTER INSERT ON SNS_COMMENT
FOR EACH STATEMENT DECLARE BEGIN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('New Comment inserted into table'); END;
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER notice_trigger AFTER INSERT ON SNS_COMMENT_LIKE FOR EACH STATEMENT DECLARE BEGIN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('New Comment_Like inserted into table'); END;
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER notice_trigger AFTER INSERT ON POST FOR EACH STATEMENT DECLARE BEGIN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('New Post inserted into table'); END;
CREATE OR REPLACE TRIGGER notice_trigger AFTER INSERT ON POST_LIKE FOR EACH STATEMENT DECLARE BEGIN DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('New Post_Like inserted into table'); END;
